title: caffe2/aten/src/THC/THCReduce.cuh(161): warning: dynamic initialization is not supported for a function-scope
body_html:
I'm seeing this warning on builds:

caffe2/aten/src/THC/THCReduce.cuh(161): warning: dynamic initialization is not supported for a function-scope 
static __shared__ variable within a __device__/__global__ function
          detected during:
            instantiation of "void kernelReduceNoncontigDim_shared<T,IndexType,AccT,ModifyOp,ReduceOp,Finalize
Op,ADims,BDims>(TensorInfo<T, IndexType>, TensorInfo<T, IndexType>, IndexType, IndexType, IndexType, AccT, Mod
ifyOp, ReduceOp, FinalizeOp, volatile AccT *, int *) [with T=c10::Half, IndexType=unsigned int, AccT=WelfordDa
ta<float, c10::Half>, ModifyOp=ModifyWelford<WelfordData<float, c10::Half>>, ReduceOp=ReduceWelford<float, c10
::Half>, FinalizeOp=VarianceWelford<float, c10::Half>, ADims=2, BDims=2]" 
(603): here
            instantiation of "__nv_bool THC_reduceDim<ScalarType,TensorType,ModifyOp,ReduceOp,FinalizeOp,AccT>
(THCState *, TensorType *, TensorType *, ModifyOp, ReduceOp, FinalizeOp, AccT, int, int) [with ScalarType=c10:
:Half, TensorType=at::TensorImpl, ModifyOp=ModifyWelford<WelfordData<float, c10::Half>>, ReduceOp=ReduceWelfor
d<float, c10::Half>, FinalizeOp=VarianceWelford<float, c10::Half>, AccT=WelfordData<float, c10::Half>]" 
caffe2/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorMathReduce.cu(91): here

CC @jjsjann123 who modified this code recently

body:
I'm seeing this warning on builds:

```
caffe2/aten/src/THC/THCReduce.cuh(161): warning: dynamic initialization is not supported for a function-scope 
static __shared__ variable within a __device__/__global__ function
          detected during:
            instantiation of "void kernelReduceNoncontigDim_shared<T,IndexType,AccT,ModifyOp,ReduceOp,Finalize
Op,ADims,BDims>(TensorInfo<T, IndexType>, TensorInfo<T, IndexType>, IndexType, IndexType, IndexType, AccT, Mod
ifyOp, ReduceOp, FinalizeOp, volatile AccT *, int *) [with T=c10::Half, IndexType=unsigned int, AccT=WelfordDa
ta<float, c10::Half>, ModifyOp=ModifyWelford<WelfordData<float, c10::Half>>, ReduceOp=ReduceWelford<float, c10
::Half>, FinalizeOp=VarianceWelford<float, c10::Half>, ADims=2, BDims=2]" 
(603): here
            instantiation of "__nv_bool THC_reduceDim<ScalarType,TensorType,ModifyOp,ReduceOp,FinalizeOp,AccT>
(THCState *, TensorType *, TensorType *, ModifyOp, ReduceOp, FinalizeOp, AccT, int, int) [with ScalarType=c10:
:Half, TensorType=at::TensorImpl, ModifyOp=ModifyWelford<WelfordData<float, c10::Half>>, ReduceOp=ReduceWelfor
d<float, c10::Half>, FinalizeOp=VarianceWelford<float, c10::Half>, AccT=WelfordData<float, c10::Half>]" 
caffe2/aten/src/THC/generic/THCTensorMathReduce.cu(91): here
```

CC @jjsjann123 who modified this code recently
